Package com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory
    StdCombiningAlgorithmFactory extends CombiningAlgorithmFactory to implement a mapping from Identifiers to the standard CombiningAlgorithm implementations.
    StdCombiningAlgorithms
    StdCombiningAlgorithms contains single instances of each of the CombiningAlgorithm implementations in the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.combiners package.
    StdEvaluationContext
    StdEvaluationContext implements the EvaluationContext interface using default factories to load the XACML policies, and get the PIP engines.
    StdEvaluationContextFactory
    StdEvaluationContextFactory extends EvaluationContextFactory to implement the getEvaluationContext method with a standard EvaluationContext.
    StdFunctionDefinitionFactory
    StdFunctionDefinitionFactory is the default FunctionDefinitionFactory implementation used if no other FunctionDefinitionFactory implementation is supplied.
    StdFunctions
    StdFunctions contains the Identifier values for the standard XACML functions.
    StdPolicyFinder
    StdPolicyFinder implements the PolicyFinder interface to look up policies by their internal ID or an externally visible ID.
    StdPolicyFinderFactory
    StdPolicyFinderFactory extends PolicyFinderFactory with the getPolicyFinder method to get a single instance of the StdPolicyFinder.
    StdPolicyFinderResult<T extends PolicyDef>
    StdPolicyFinderResult implements the PolicyFinderResult interface.
    StdProperties  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StdPolicyFinder.StdPolicyFinderException
